ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Dark Elves and Luclin
ygData.msgSnippet: You will be fine, the zone you buy horses in is neutral and not run by Vah Shir, though I think you can prolly buy horses in the vah shir hometown also.. ... I
ygData.messageBody:
You will be fine, the zone you buy horses in is neutral and not run by
Vah'Shir, though I think you can prolly buy horses in the vah'shir
hometown also..
>
I didn't see any for sale in that zone. From what I heard, they are only for
sale in the bazaar and you have to be a high enough level to go through the
joining zones.
But if anyone finds more info, I'd appreciate it.
luv,
-Su


-----Ursprungligt meddelande-----
Från: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
Skickat: den 4 januari 2002 14:32
Till: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Ämne: [EverQuest] Dark Elves and Luclin


Are dark elves KOS to the vah shir?
I was thinking of taking my DE wizard to Luclin to see the horses but am
afraid she'll be killed.. Btw, anyone else hope they fix the faces in
Luclin? My DE used to be pretty. luv, -Su
